DOC.brief_summary: This study will help to better characterize oral and written language disorders and determine if these disorders are continuous or not. The participants ( dyslexic and dysphasic patients and control adults) will carry out an auditory lexical decision task during which an electroencephalogram (EEG) will be recorded.
DOC.brief_title: Developmental Language Difficulties: Behavioural and Electrophysiological Studies
